articles.description: Parent One 97 Communications says revenue rose to Rs 1,914 crore in second quarter from Rs 1,086 crore a year earlier
articles.content:
Digital payments firm Paytm reported a 76% jump in second-quarter revenue, driven by a surge in loan growth.
Paytm's parent One 97 Communications said revenue rose to Rs 1,914 crore ($233.81 million… [+1784 chars]

articles.title: Reserve Bank of India should 'judiciously' use the forex reserves; let rupee to depreciate gradually: CEA - Economic Times
articles.description: The comment comes at a time when the central bank has burned over $110 billion in a desperate attempt to check rupee's slump against the greenback. However, the local unit dropped to an all-time low last month, breaching past the 83 per dollar level, while th…
articles.content:
The Reserve Bank of India should let the rupee to weaken gradually and use foreign exchange reserves 'judiciously', the chief economic adviser to the federal finance ministry said on Monday.
